Kelsey_Hart:
{{short description|American singer-songwriter}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Kelsey Hart | image = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = | birth_place = [[Kentucky]], United States | genre = [[Country music|Country]] | occupation = Singer-songwriter | instrument = Vocals, guitar | years_active = 2017â€“present | label = [[Curb Records|Curb]] | website = {{URL|https://officialkelseyhart.com/}} }} '''Kelsey Hart''' is an American [[country music]] singer-songwriter from [[Kentucky]] signed to [[Curb Records]].{{cite web|url=https://www.opry.com/artists/kelsey-hart|title=Kelsey Hart: Opry|website=Grand Ole Opry|accessdate=May 5, 2024}} ==Background== After several years of songwriting for other artists under Word Music Publishing, Hart signed his own record deal with [[Curb Records]] in January 2023.{{cite web|url=https://musicrow.com/2023/01/kelsey-hart-signs-with-curb-records/|title=Kelsey Hart Signs With Curb Records|author=Lorie Hollabaugh|date=January 23, 2023|website=Music Row|accessdate=May 5, 2024}} His debut single, "Life with You", was released in November 2023, and charted on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Country Airplay]] chart. It served as the lead single and title track to his debut studio album, which was released on May 31, 2024.{{cite web|url=https://www.curb.com/2024/05/curb-records-artist-kelsey-hart-builds-autobiographical-debut-around-life-with-you-slated-to-drop-may-31-2024/|title=Curb Records Artist Kelsey Hart Builds Autobiographical Debut Around Life With You, Slated To Drop May 31, 2024|date=May 3, 2024|website=Curb Records|accessdate=May 5, 2024}} Hart made his [[Grand Ole Opry]] debut on June 28, 2024. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums, with selected details, chart positions and sales ! rowspan="1" style="width:8em;"| Title ! rowspan="1" style="width:18em;"| Album details |- ! scope="row" |''Life with You'' | * Release date: May 31, 2024{{cite web|url=https://musicrow.com/2024/05/kelsey-hart-to-share-life-with-you-this-month/|title=Kelsey Hart To Share 'Life With You' This Month|author=Madison Hahnen|date=May 3, 2024|website=Music Row|accessdate=May 5, 2024}} * Label: [[Curb Records|Curb]] * Format: CD, digital download |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of singles, with selected chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Year ! scope="col" colspan="2"| Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Album |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! scope="col" width="45"| [[Hot Country Songs|US Country]]
{{cite magazine|url=http://bulletins.billboard.com/country/country_update_2024_0513.pdf|title=Billboard Country Update|magazine=[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]|date=May 13, 2024|access-date=May 14, 2024}} ! scope="col" width="45"| [[Country Airplay|US Country Airplay]]
